subsection.name: Build Procedure
subsection.p: The DPML platform has the four major product groups. To build respective products please invoke the following commands:
subsection.pre: $ cd main $ ant transit ... builds the transit diustribution and updates the local installation $ ant magic ... builds the magic build system (requires transit) $ ant metro ... builds Metro (requires Magic) $ ant central ... builds site documentation (requires Metro)
subsection.p: Please note that the Transit build will install the junit jar file under the .ant/lib directory if not available. In such a case the build will exit with a failed condition and a message requesting recommencement of the build. If you run transit target a second time the build will continue as normal.
